title: Bobo et al on Black Studies - characterize

content.question: Which of the following is a feature of African American Studies?

choices.label: It analyzes the history, culture, and contributions of members of the African diaspora.
It focuses exclusively on Afro-descendants in the United States.
It is a subfield within the discipline of history.
It is a relatively new field that rejects the rigors of scholarly inquiry.

content.answer: It analyzes the history, culture, and contributions of members of the African diaspora.

skill.text: 1.A: Identify and explain course concepts, developments, and processes.
